sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select
         max(case when property_name = ''container_name'' then property_value end) container_name,
         max(case when property_name = ''folder_name'' then property_value end) folder_name,
         max(case when property_name = ''file_name'' then property_value end) file_name
from dbo.etl_metadata_config where etl_job_name = ',
'''',
pipeline().parameters.p_etl_job_name,
'''')
